duck: Google Trends - Google Trends is a public web facility of Google Inc., based on Google Search, that shows how often a particular search-term is entered relative to the total search-volume across various regions...
trend definition: to extend in a general direction.
Market trend, prolonged period of time when prices in a financial market are rising or falling faster than their historical average, also known as "bull" and "bear" markets, respectively
Periodic trends, tendencies of certain elemental characteristics to increase or decrease as one progresses along a row or column of the periodic table of elements

wiki.text:
'Trend' may refer to:

* A fad, including fashion trends ** Trendsetter (or early adopter), person
  who starts (or follows early on) a fashion or technology trend before most
  other people
* Market trend, prolonged period of time when prices in a financial market are
  rising or falling faster than their historical average, also known as "bull"
  and "bear" markets, respectively
wiki.title: Trend
